column1: You will start the on-boarding/tutorial now.

We will walk you through the different tasks that you will be expected to perform throughout this study. We will acquaint you with the dashboard/visualization and the process of a planting decision-making.

column2: you received a document that you can keep open as a reference when you navigate the visualization.

column3: you will have a textbox where you can take notes as you go through the different views. Please do not delete any of the notes you take
column4: as we will be collecting them for analysis. You will also have a calculator to perform basic calculations to help you make your decisions.
